data.name: Malicious Reload
data.detailed_description:
üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1844230/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1925210/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

‚ñ†Outline
A new agent, Lynette, is asked by the government to investigate an abandoned village.
She tries to join up with Lloyd, who went to the abandoned village before her, but..."

‚ñ†Game Content
Take control of Lynette and investigate the abandoned village.
You'll need to find out everything you can about the place.
You never know what might be out there, so always be ready to fire your gun.
Gamepad recommended!
This game contains sexual and violent scenes and grotesque expressions.

‚ñ†H scenes etc.
HCG, 18 dot animations

‚ÄªGallery available
The gallery will be released gradually according to the progress of the game.

‚ñ†List of Cheats and Hidden Commands
You can switch on/off anywhere by entering the following commands.

Infinite weapon ammo Press A quickly 3 times

Creature Voice Press ‚Üì 3 times quickly

Reminiscence Mode: Press ‚Üë three times quickly.

‚ÄªWhen you turn on reminiscence mode, you can view the gallery from the save terminal.
„ÄÄThe gallery will be released gradually as you progress through the game.
„ÄÄIf you want to save the game, please turn it off.

‚ñ†Controls

Move: ‚Üê or ‚Üí.

Jump: X

Evade: F

Hold your weapon: S
Upper stance: Hold S and move up *Handgun only
Lower stance: Hold S and move down *only handguns

Fire: Z while pressing S

Switch weapons: D
„ÄÄ„ÄÄ
Decide and check: Z

Check possessions: C

‚ÄªSave to regain all your health.
„ÄÄThere are no recovery items.

‚ÄªWhen the game is over, use the spacebar to return to the title.
„ÄÄYou can also use the spacebar to return to the title at any time, even if the game is not over.

data.short_description: A new agent, Lynette, has been asked by the government to investigate an abandoned village. She tries to join up with Lloyd, who has already gone to the abandoned village, but...
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Extra Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
